column6: comment:"it was my first order from daraz and i was worried about the product n its quality whether they deliver safely or not but alhamdulillah today i received it in excellent condition good packing n everything was upto the mark. 10/10 to the seller delivered within 5 days."}

column22: comment:"Machine was well packed. I got delivered after two weeks which was disappointing. However overall experience was great as i got this machine from low price than its actual market cost."}

column114: comment:"This machine has been AMAZING. I live in a small one bedroom apartment with no washer dryer hook ups. So to lug everything to a family members or to the laundromat was just becoming a hassle. Not to mention during a pandemic less exposure to others is key!"}
column117: comment:"I chose this washer as a replacement for my Haier portable. After 9 years of working fine
column118: the electronics died in the Haier. The Haier had great reviews and I never had a complaint. So
column119: it is my benchmark for a new portable washing machine."}
column122: comment:"It's an easy to use laundry machine. From the outside
column125: and even older people can quickly learn how to use it. With the transparent top cover
column126: you can observe its working condition while using"}
column129: comment:"It has electronic controls with an LED display that makes setting it up very easy
column130: there are 10 different washing programs and 8 water levels to choose
column131: from this makes it easy to get the exact performance I need without any issues."}
